Shine for Philips Hue
Perfect lighting every time
$2.99

Shine for Philips Hue allows you to take control of you digitally-connected lightbulbs like never before.

You are only one press away from turning the lights on or off. Home automation was never faster. Choose a dynamic scene, dim the lights or chose from over 16k colors for your lights — all from the comfort of your desktop.

Never touch a lightswitch again
  • You are one tap away from turning the lights on and off.
  • Dim the lights down to the right level with ease
  • Group the lights into the perfect combination
The right atmopshere, at the right time
  • Dynamic scenes create the mood, you bring in the party
  • Choose from a growing list of themed lighting scenes
  • You favorite Meethue.com portal scenes one click away
It's all about color
  • 16K colors to pick and choose via two colorwheels
  • 9 Preset Kelvin color temperatures for warmth
  • All colors of the rainbow, even office flourecents



Works on Mac, Windows, Linux, and Chromebooks.

API Starter

Install Lightswitch »

Lightswitch allows you to control digitally connected Philip Hue lightbulbs — straight from your browser.

Home automation was never faster. One press — turning the lights on or off. Dim the lights with a mouse swipe. Choose a mood that suites you best and have the home natural — changing lights as nature does, continuesly. Chose from 16k colors for all the lamps, individually or for the whole house.

  • Dynamic themes

    Including Romantic Red, Disco, Sunrise, on individual light bulbs.

  • 16k Colors

    Full-color spectrum, including 9 Kelvin notes, 6 Fluorescent lights.

  • Simple & Minimal

    Auto bridge discovery. One-step setup. With a single tap - control.

  • Groups, Dimmer

    Control individual light bulbs, as well as groups. Single-click dimmer.

Lightswitch works as a plugin Google Chrome extension for Mac, Windows, and Linux.
